key.name: icon-size
key.description: The size of the icons in files lists (in pixels).

key.name: blacklist-recent
key.description: List of strings. Possible types are: text, image, audio, video, application, multipart, message, model (these correspond to the MIME standard.)

key.name: top-padding
key.description: The number of pixels left empty at the top (for the top bar for example).

key.name: right-padding
key.description: The number of pixels left empty at the right (for a lateral dock for example).

key.name: left-padding
key.description: The number of pixels left empty at the left (for a lateral dock for example).

key.name: bottom-padding
key.description: The number of pixels left empty at the bottom (for a bottom dock for example).

key.name: position
key.summary: Where the extension should display its shit

key.name: search-in-path
key.summary: If the search among recent files should be done based on the file path.
key.description: If "true", the search among recent files will be done based on the file path; if "false", it will be based on the file name only.

key.name: not-overwrite-layout
key.summary: If the preferences dialog should overwrite the layout settings
key.description: If it's false, the layout isn't managed by the preferences dialog, but by the user using dconf

key.name: active-widgets
key.description: List of strings. Possible widgets are: places, searchbar, recent, desktop

key.name: active-positions
key.description: List of integers between 0 and 3. '0' describes the left column, '1' the top-center row, '2' the bottom-center row, '3' the right column. Inactive boxes are hidden.
